item.description:
Please note: this workshop is facilitated by Christian. You may contact him at info@soulfulpower.us
or at 877-773-7557. Please see more info at http://soulfulpower.u... and RSVP on that page, or via this meetup.



Relationships are the area of life where most people forfeit their inner power.
This workshop with Christian will teach you how to use relationships consciously as a vehicle for personal growth, empowerment and spiritual transformation.


Workshop includes Transformational Breathwork, guided meditations, deep inner group work.

Workshop is facilitated by Master Breathwork Practitioner, author and inner work expert of 20 years Christian de la Huerta.

IN THIS WORKSHOP YOU WILL LEARN:


  • Crucial information about the mechanism of the ego and its role in relationships, the nature of projection and how it works to keep us blind to unhealed areas in ourselves.
  • How relationship can be used to see our own projections, fear and blocks, and thereby learn to heal ourselves.

  • How to have powerful, intimate, loving relationships that work.

  • How to exercise power fully, in healthy and authentic ways.
  • Expressing yourself with more graceful authority in relationships.
  • Understand differences between soulful and egoic power.


Workshop includes 2-hours Transformational Breathwork session.

To read more and rsvp online.



I trained and practiced with Christian, and recommend his work in highest terms.
Read what others have to say .
Known effects of work with Christian are exceptional clarity about one's own essence and purpose,
lasting self-healing, major spiritual advancements, and positive life changes for those
who continue this work on their own.


If you want to attend, but price is an issue, please email; no one will be turned down.
item.how_to_find_us: 10 min walk from Watertown sq. Parking is on a street and parking lots. Sunday meters are free (believe so).
item.name: Soulful Power in Relationships. 1-day workshop with Christian de la Huerta.
